verses.plain: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.

tokens.t: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.

verses.plain: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:

tokens.t: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:

verses.plain: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God: and this is that spirit of antichrist, whereof ye have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.

tokens.t: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God: and this is that
of antichrist, whereof ye have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.

verses.plain: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.

tokens.t: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.

verses.plain: They are of the world: therefore speak they of the world, and the world heareth them.

tokens.t: They are of the world: therefore speak they of the world, and the world heareth them.

verses.plain: We are of God: he that knoweth God heareth us; he that is not of God heareth not us. Hereby know we the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.

tokens.t: We are of God: he that knoweth God heareth us; he that is not of God heareth not us. Hereby know we the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.

verses.plain: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.

tokens.t: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.

verses.plain: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.

tokens.t: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.

verses.plain: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.

tokens.t: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.

verses.plain: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.

tokens.t: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son
the propitiation for our sins.

verses.plain: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.

tokens.t: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.

verses.plain: No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.

tokens.t: No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.

verses.plain: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.

tokens.t: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.

verses.plain: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world.

tokens.t: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son
the Saviour of the world.

verses.plain: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.

tokens.t: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.

verses.plain: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

tokens.t: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

verses.plain: Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.

tokens.t: Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.

verses.plain: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.

tokens.t: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.

verses.plain: We love him, because he first loved us.

tokens.t: We love him, because he first loved us.

verses.plain: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?

tokens.t: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?

verses.plain: And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.

tokens.t: And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.
